rooms.description: Adjacent dining area with ample space for movement and wheelchair accessibility.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony on the east side offering privacy and ample natural light.
Secondary bedroom with a spacious balcony on the west side to maintain privacy and natural ventilation.
Accessible bathroom designed with grab bars and wider doors for wheelchair accessibility.
Well-equipped private gym with ample space for exercise equipment and built-in storage. Features wheelchair accessible design.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a ramp and automatic door.
Additional entry point for guests, ensuring smooth movement for wheelchairs.
Floor-to-ceiling balcony door in Bedroom 1 connecting to the east-facing balcony.

levels.notes: The design follows a Brutalist style with raw concrete surfaces, simple geometric forms, and utilitarian aesthetics. Vastu principles have been integrated by positioning rooms according to directional energy flows. All elements are designed to be wheelchair accessible in compliance with local building codes.
